title: Ernesto Martínez - Data Scientist and Web Developer
description: Ernesto Martínez - Data Scientist and Web Developer. A Data Science student at Universitat Politècnica de València with a passion for web development and a self-taught programmer since 2020. Explore my projects in movie recommendation, Pokémon card detection, athletics ranking analysis, and workout timer app. Connect with me on LinkedIn and GitHub.
